"How to Join a Team": "To join a Team, open the Main Menu with <swguidetype T_MainMenu>, select \"Communication\", then select \"Teams Currently Looking for Members\" to view a list of Teams currently looking for Members."

"Selecting a Team from the list of results will give you the following options:
・Team Details
・Team Managers
・Send Application to Team Master"

"Select Send Application to Team Master to send a request to join the Team to the Team Master.

If your application is approved, you will become a Member of the Team.

In some situations, you may not be able to apply for Team membership, such as if the Team is full."
"Select \"Team Details\" to view more details about the Team, such as its level and its number of members."
"Select \"Team Managers\" to view the Player ID Names of the Team Managers and the Team Master."
